personalInfo.name: Kushal Ghimire
personalInfo.title: Security Analyst
personalInfo.headline:
Highly motivated and detail-oriented IT professional [cite: 1]
Proven experience in security monitoring, incident response, and vulnerability testing [cite: 1]
personalInfo.bio: Proven ability to proactively identify and mitigate security threats, conduct risk assessments, and ensure compliance with industry standards[cite: 2]. Adept at collaborating with technical and non-technical teams to achieve organizational security objectives[cite: 3]. Eager to contribute expertise and continuous learning mindset.

experience.title: Computer Network and Systems Engineer
experience.institution: Rathbone Wine Group, Port Melbourne, VIC
experience.description: Elevate security posture by proactively identifying and mitigating threats, implementing advanced security controls, and ensuring the Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability of IT infrastructure[cite: 5]. Provide comprehensive technical support, ensuring swift resolution of IT issues[cite: 6]. Proactively identify and resolve performance bottlenecks[cite: 7]. Improve operational efficiency by automating repetitive tasks[cite: 8]. Implement and enforce MFA and strengthen endpoint security[cite: 9]. Collaborate with stakeholders on security controls and awareness initiatives[cite: 10, 13]. Proactively monitor and respond to security alerts and incidents[cite: 15].

experience.title: Cybersecurity Analyst Intern
experience.description: Supported the development and maintenance of a robust Information Security Management System (ISMS)[cite: 16]. Gained practical experience in implementing and monitoring security policies, conducting risk assessments and vulnerability scans, and contributing to incident response procedures[cite: 17]. Investigated and responded to security incidents, gaining experience in threat assessment, containment, and eradication techniques[cite: 18].

experience.title: IT Support Technician/Helpdesk
experience.institution: City Mobiles and PC, Bharatpur, Nepal
experience.description: Provided comprehensive technical support to stakeholders in a fast-paced environment, demonstrating strong problem-solving and communication skills[cite: 19].

educationAndCerts.title: Master's of Computer Systems Networking (Major: Cyber Security)
educationAndCerts.institution: Melbourne Institute of Technology, Melbourne, VIC

skills.sectionSubtitle: Key competencies and technical proficiencies demonstrated throughout my career.

Threat Hunting & Analysis: Threat intelligence platforms (VirusTotal, Cisco Talos, MISP)
Vulnerability & Penetration Testing: Vulnerability assessment scanners (Nmap, Tenable Nessus, Burp Suite, Qualys)

projects.sectionSubtitle: Demonstrating practical application of cybersecurity skills.

items.title: Home Lab Environment
items.description: Managed environment including Active Directory (AD), DNS, DHCP, Elastic Stack for log management, Wazuh and Splunk SIEM implementations, and Snort IPS/IDS for network monitoring and threat detection[cite: 1].

blog.sectionSubtitle: Sharing thoughts, tutorials, and findings on various cybersecurity topics and trends.

contactInfo.introText: Interested in collaborating or discussing cybersecurity? Feel free to reach out.
